articles.author: Aisha Malik
articles.title: Google’s NotebookLM now lets you talk to its AI podcast hosts - TechCrunch
articles.description: Google announced on Friday that NotebookLM is rolling out the ability for users to interact with the AI podcast hosts.
articles.content:
A few months ago, Google’s NotebookLM note-taking app debuted an Audio Overviews feature that generates a podcast with AI virtual hosts based on information you have shared with the app. 
Now Notebo… [+1451 chars]
